title: I Can Skate
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 29 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: In I Can Skate readers learn about some of the movements you can do while skating. Simple sentences, delightful illustrations, and high-frequency words offer support for early emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to identify the setting as well as antonyms and complete sentences.
meta: backward, fast, forward, jump, slow, spin
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /f/ sound
Complete Sentences : Recognize and use complete sentences

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
